autotest.extractpot module¶

class autotest.extractpot.ExtractPot(program_name, locale)¶

This class is used to extract the pot file. It works by downloading the src package from Koji and unpacking the rpm and extracting the .pot file. Then translation statistics are generated.

extractPot()¶

Download the src.rpm from Koji package repo. Unpack the downloaded RPM and generate the .pot file. .pot file is then moved to ~/.autotest/pot_files.

getStats()¶

Get the translaton statistics on the .po file using the msgfmt utility.

autotest.extractpot.test_extractPot()¶
